scripts.start: npm run watch & npm run lite
scripts.build:production: browserify src/Zenpad.js --standalone Zenpad -t babelify | derequire > build/zenpad.js
scripts.build:develop: browserify src/Zenpad.js --standalone Zenpad -t babelify -d | derequire > build/zenpad.js
scripts.release: npm run build:production && npm run versionup && npm publish
